content: HPS-1 R Impact anchor Economical plastic impact anchor with corrosion-resistant A2 stainless steel screw for outdoor use ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Suitable for outdoor use – includes corrosion-resistant stainless steel screw Faster installation – hammer-in impact anchors can be set in seconds Removable – screw is designed to be hammered in, but can be removed using a screwdriver Extreme versatility – you can use these impact anchors in many materials, including perforated brick and block Applications Fastening light frames, battens and metal profiles outdoors and in moderately corrosive environments Fastening components for electrical and plumbing installations Anchoring brick ties to concrete and masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Flat head Environmental conditions: Dry indoor Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Flat head | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, A2 | Type of fixing | Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 260358 - Impact anchor HPS-1 3/16 x 1-1/2 SS304 - Package Size 200 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 R 5/15 Impact anchor assy - 246936 - Impact anc HPS-1 3/16 x 1-1/2 SS304 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2400x HPS-1 R 5/15 Impact anchor assy
